001package Corner_Detection;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004import java.awt.Graphics2D;
005import java.awt.Shape;
006import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
007import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
008import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
009import java.awt.geom.PathIterator;
010import java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D;
011import java.util.LinkedList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.Arrow;
017import ij.gui.Line;
018import ij.gui.PointRoi;
019import ij.gui.PolygonRoi;
020import ij.gui.Roi;
021import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
022import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
023import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
024import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageGraphics;
025import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
026import imagingbook.pub.corners.Corner;
027import imagingbook.pub.corners.GradientCornerDetector;
028import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
029import imagingbook.pub.corners.HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters;
030import imagingbook.pub.corners.util.CornerOverlay;
031import imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic.Point;
032import imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel.MaxLocator.Method;
033
034public class Make_Corner_Test_Image3 implements PlugIn {
035        
036        static int width = 512;
037        static int height = 512;
038        
039        static int Nx = 5;
040        static int Ny = 5;
041
042
043        @Override
044        public void run(String arg) {
045
046                ByteProcessor ip = new ByteProcessor(width, height);
047                ip.setColor(128);
048                ip.fill();
049                
050                
051                AffineTransform T = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(2.3, 0);
052                
053                int N = Nx * Ny;
054                
055                double dx = (double) width / (Nx + 1);
056                double dy = (double) height / (Ny + 1);
057                
058                double rectW = 30;
059                double rectH = 50;
060                
061                double deltaAngle = Math.PI / 2 / N;
062                
063                List<Shape> rectangles = new LinkedList<>();
064                
065                try (ImageGraphics g = new ImageGraphics(ip)) {
066                        g.setColor(255);
067//                      g.setLineWidth(0);
068                        Graphics2D g2 = g.getGraphics();
069                        
070                        int k = 0;
071                        for (int j = 0; j < Ny; j++) {
072                                double y = dy * (j + 1);
073                                for (int i = 0; i < Nx; i++) {
074                                        double x = dx * (i + 1);
075                                        Shape rect = new Rectangle2D.Double(x - rectW/2, y - rectH/2, rectW, rectH);
076                                        double angle = deltaAngle * k;
077                                        AffineTransform R = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(angle, x, y);
078                                        Shape rectR = R.createTransformedShape(rect);
079                                        rectangles.add(rectR);
080                                        //listPoints(rectR);
081                                        g2.fill(rectR);
082                                        k++;
083                                }
084                        }
085                }
086                
087                Parameters params = new Parameters();
088                params.doCleanUp = false;
089                params.maxLocatorMethod = Method.QuadraticLeastSquares; //Method.Quartic; //Method.Parabolic; //Method.None; //
090                GradientCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
091                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
092                
093                CornerOverlay.DefaultMarkerSize = 3;
094                CornerOverlay oly = new CornerOverlay();
095                oly.strokeColor(Color.green);
096                oly.strokeWidth(1.0);
097                oly.addItems(corners);
098                
099                
100                // iterate over all rectangles
101                for (Shape r : rectangles) {
102                        //listPoints(r);
103                        // create the true rectangle polygon
104                        List<Point> rectPoints = getPoints(r);
105                        Roi roiR = makePolygon(rectPoints);
106                        roiR.setStrokeColor(Color.blue);
107                        roiR.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
108                        oly.addRoi(roiR);
109                        
110                        // find the closest corner for each rectangle point
111                        List<Point> cornerPoints = new LinkedList<>();
112                        for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
113                                Point p = rectPoints.get(i);
114                                Corner c = findClosest(p, corners);
115                                cornerPoints.add(c);
116                        }
117                        
118                        // create the detected corner polygon
119                        Roi roiC = makePolygon(cornerPoints);
120                        roiC.setStrokeColor(Color.red);
121                        roiC.setStrokeWidth(0.25);
122                        oly.addRoi(roiC, true);
123                }
124                
125                
126                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus("Corner Test", ip);
127                im.setOverlay(oly);
128                im.show();
129                
130
131                //IJ.runPlugIn(Find_Corners_Harris.class.getName(), null);
132        }
133        
134        Shape makeTriangle(double x0, double y0, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2) {
135                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();      
136                poly.moveTo(x0, y0);
137                poly.lineTo(x1, y1);
138                poly.lineTo(x2, y2);
139                poly.closePath();
140                return poly;
141        }
142        
143        void listPoints(Shape s) {
144                IJ.log("rectangle: ");
145                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
146                double[] coords = new double[6];
147                int i = 0;
148                while (!pi.isDone()) {
149                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
150                        IJ.log("  " + Matrix.toString(coords));
151                        pi.next();
152                        i++;
153                }
154        }
155        
156        List<Point> getPoints(Shape s) {
157                List<Point> points = new LinkedList<>();
158                PathIterator pi = s.getPathIterator(null);
159                double[] coords = new double[6];
160                while (!pi.isDone()) {
161                        pi.currentSegment(coords);
162                        points.add(Point.create(coords[0], coords[1]));
163                        pi.next();
164                }
165                return points;
166        }
167        
168        Corner findClosest(Point p, List<Corner> corners) {
169                Corner minCorner = null;
170                double minDist = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
171                for (Corner c : corners) {
172                        double dist2 = p.distance2(c);
173                        if (dist2 < minDist) {
174                                minCorner = c;
175                                minDist = dist2;
176                        }
177                }
178                return minCorner;
179        }
180        
181        ShapeRoi makePolygon(List<Point> points) {
182                Point[] pa = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
183                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();
184                poly.moveTo(pa[0].getX(), pa[0].getY());
185                for (int i=1; i<pa.length; i++) {
186                        poly.lineTo(pa[i].getX(), pa[i].getY());
187                }
188                poly.closePath();
189                return new ShapeRoi(poly);
190        }
191

193//              Point[] pointA = points.toArray(new Point[0]);
194//

200//                      yPoints[i] = (float) pointA[i].getY();
201//              }
202//              PolygonRoi pRoi = new PolygonRoi(xPoints, yPoints, Roi.POLYLINE);
203//              
204//              return pRoi;
205//      }
206
207}
